revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Runtop |model=WS4000 |revision= |availability=OEM,unknown |type=wireless to serial converter |fcc_id=KFY-WS4000 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8651B |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |wi1_module=Runtop WA4350 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8185L |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model= |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |oui= |oui_eth= }}This is a Wireless to Serial converter.
"A/N: PCWA4350-000-RR300", "P/N: WA4350 Rev. RR", "START: 2005/05/23" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
The FCC test report lists the following units as identical (besides appearance and antenna configuration)... *WS4000 (integral antenna) *WS4001 (detachable antenna)
